paragraphs: These ancient tunnels are perfect for our purposes! The Veiled Queen needs weapons, and where better to acquire them than from the weaponsmiths of Mathiisen? Already, we have secured Condalin the Forgemaster over to our way of thinking, and the first shipment of weapons has already been transported through the tunnels and out to sea—right under that smug Ayrenn's cute little nose!
We'll reclaim this land or die trying!
For the High Elves! For the Veiled Queen!
